vote.text: Amendment SA 5135 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 64 - 33. Record Vote Number: 271.

action.text: Motion to waive all applicable budgetary discipline with respect to amendment SA 5135 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 64 - 33. Record Vote Number: 270.
